title: Leaving your job? Take these steps before returning your work devices.
description: Advice for workers on saving, transferring and deleting data from their laptops and mobile devices before leaving a job.

title: We spent a day with Anthony Padilla, YouTube’s interview king
description: Padilla, whose channel boasts nearly 7 million subscribers, found fame by eschewing trends and cringe content.

title: Top privacy executives quit Twitter, raising questions about data security
description: The resignations of three executives on Thursday came after Twitter owner Elon Musk ordered that all employees must work from the office.

title: Biden says Elon Musk’s foreign connections are ‘worth being looked at’
description: President Biden said the new Twitter owner's "cooperation" with other countries deserves scrutiny, adding he wasn't suggesting Musk was "doing anything inappropriate."

title: Facebook thought pandemic online shopping would last forever. It didn’t.
description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg said 11,000 workers lost their jobs in part because he overestimated the staying power of the e-commerce boom.
